alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains north of 198 (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 2:23PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...Heavy rain and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Merced and west central Fresno Counties through 245 PM PDT... At 222 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorms and area of heavy rain along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Los Banos to 14 miles southwest of Firebaugh. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and a short period of heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Los Banos, South Dos Palos, Gustine, Dos Palos, San Luis Dam and San Luis National Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains north of 198
